#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
long long A[1000000];
int main()
{
	long long t,i,j,k,l,m,n;
	string str;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n;
		cin>>str;
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
			cin>>m;
			A[i] = m-1;
		}
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
			char a = str[i];
			str[i] = str[A[i]];
			str[A[i]] = a;
		}
		cout<<str<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
